quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I came, I saw, I conquered.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: History is written by the victors.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Give me liberty, or give me death!
author: Patrick Henry

quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
author: George Santayana

quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates
